Name: Perfume Data
Abstract: This data consists of odors of 20 different perfumes. Data was obtained by using a handheld odor meter (OMX-GR sensor) per second for 28 seconds period.
RelevantInfo: The data set gathered when we were working at project for Bahrain university between 2002 and 2003.
Source:
Prof. Dr. Bekir KARLIK, bkarlik '@' selcuk.edu.tr, Department of Computer Engineering, Selcuk University, Konya-Turkey 
Assoc. Prof. Dr. Yousif Al-Bastaki, Department of Computer Science, Bahrain University, Kingdom of Bahrain

AttributeInfo: The data was obtained from 20 different perfumes by using a handheld odor meter(OMX-GR sensor). Names of these perfumes are: ajayeb, ajmal, amreaj, aood, asgar_ali, bukhoor, burberry, dehenalaod, junaid, kausar, rose, solidmusk, TeaTreeOil, raspberry, RoseMusk, strawberry, constrected2, carolina_herrera, oudh_ma'alattar, constrected1. Each column represent a measurement and there were 28 takes (one each second)
